text: Christine Ebersole (born 21 February, 1953) is an American singer, actress and musician. She played Evelyn Tracy in Black Sheep (1996) and Muffin in the comedy The Big Wedding (2013). In 2007 she won the Tony Award for Best Actress in a Musical for her work in Grey Gardens. Since 2019, she has played the role of Dottie on Bob Hearts Abishola. Ebersole was born in Winnetka, Illinois. She now lives near Maplewood, New Jersey. ==References== Category:American movie actors Category:Musicians from Illinois Category:Actors from Illinois Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Tony Award winning actors Category:People from Winnetka, Illinois
title: Christine Ebersole
